edge: The composer trio Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy composed the soundtrack for the movie Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara.
The lyrics of the soundtrack for the movie Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara were written by Javed Akhtar.
Spanish flamenco singer María del Mar Fernández performed the vocals for the song 'Señorita' in the movie Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara.
Actors Abhay Deol and Kalki Koechlin sang the song 'Señorita' along with Farhan Akhtar in the movie Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara.
Composer trio Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy collaborated with Farhan Akhtar on the movies Rock On!! and Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara.
Composer trio Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy also worked on the movie Karthik Calling Karthik with director Vipul Shah.
